workflow.description: Review the workflow. Research/review the relevant Marlin Configuration guidelines.
Choose the applicable printer configuration from the dropdown menu
Select one objective at a time and review the flash card for keywords and background info.

workflow.step: Load the file you need to edit
workflow.description: Choose whether to load the base configuration file, a configuration example file, or browse and select another file.
Find and edit the configuration settings as needed. Start with Keywords from flash card
Either Overwrite the Base file directly, or Browse and SaveAs, elsewhere.
Copy the platformio.txt field, from your chosen target platform folder,to Platformio.ini.
Build your customized firmware as described in BUILD_AND_TEST.md.
